text: Paavo Tapio Lipponen () (born 23 April 1941) is a Finnish politician and former reporter. He was Prime Minister of Finland from 1995 to 2003, and Chairman of the Social Democratic Party of Finland from 1993 to 2005. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the European Council Category:Prime Ministers of Finland Category:Speakers of the Parliament of Finland Category:Social Democratic Party of Finland politicians
title: Paavo Lipponen
